items.title: Funtribute

items.description:
I'm the author of NimbleText. Of course I put it first on the list. If I didn't personally rate it I wouldn't have spent so much time making and improving it.
I wrote but don't particularly endorse it for others to use (thus haven't migrated the source code to GitHub). It's slow and non-streaming. I'd go with . On the plus side, has a more comprehensive test suite and simpler api than most.
Mine too.
